name: 林家薇
objective:
本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調管理專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
This course aims to provide pre-service management students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.
schedule:
Week 1 Course Intro
Week 2-5 Systems Thinking in Organizations
Week 6-7 Theory U
Week 8 Review
Week 9 Midterm
Week 10-12 U Project
Week 13-15 Project Presentations
Week 16-18 Systems Thinking Reflections and Reviews
scorePolicy:
全校英文會考 20%
期中考 20%
U-Project & Presentation 20%
Final Reflection 20%
In-class preparation 20%
materials:
The Fifth Discipline: The Art & Practice of The Learning Organization Paperback – Deckle Edge, March 21, 2006
by Peter M. Senge (Author)
Theory U: Leading from the Future as It Emerges Paperback – January 1, 2009
by C. Otto Scharmer (Author)
課程是否導入AI: AI1：使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）AI3：使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）AI4：簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）AI5：深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
